title: What font is used for the word \>\>maheswary marbles
author: itsnav

comments.content:
maheshwary marbles: ITC [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus) Light  
The Biggest Stockyard: [Champagne & Limousines](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071831/http:/www.dafont.com/champagne-limousines.font) by Lauren Thompson
